metadata.description: Name of the organisation.
Short code for the name of the organisation.
Username for the Virtual Machine.
Password for the Virtual Machine.
Name or ID of the top-level service that this infrastructure is underpinning.
Short code for the name of the top-level service that this infrastructure is underpinning.
Azure Region 1 name.
Azure Region 1 shortcode.
Azure Region 2 name.
Azure Region 2 shortcode.
Azure Region 3 name.
Azure Region 3 shortcode.
Service stage 1 that this infrastructure is underpinning.
Service stage 1 that this infrastructure is underpinning.
Service stage 2 that this infrastructure is underpinning.
Service stage 2 that this infrastructure is underpinning.
Name of the Resource Group that hosts common resources used by CSR 1000v VMs.
The suffix to append when doing a concat for the VM's Resource Group name.
Name of the CSR 1000v VM.
The suffix to use when doing a concat to keep the VM name within 15 characters.
The suffix to append when doing a concat for the VM's name.
Size of VM.  Please make sure that the SKU is available in the Azure Region being deployed to
Name of the OS disk Storage Account.
The suffix to append when doing a concat for the VM's disk storage account name.
Name of the OS disk Storage Account Resource Group.
The suffix to append when doing a concat for the VM's disk storage account's resource group name.
Name of the Diagnostics Storage Account.
The suffix to append when doing a concat for the VM's diagnostics storage account name.
Name of the Diagnostics Storage Account Resource Group.
The suffix to append when doing a concat for the VM's diagnostics storage account's resource group name.
Name of the existing virtual network.
The suffix to append when doing a concat for the VNet's name.
Name of the resource group that the existing virtual network sits in.
The suffix to append when doing a concat for the common resources resource group's name.
Name of the third subnet.
The suffix to append when doing a concat for Subnet 3's name.
Name of the fourth subnet.
The suffix to append when doing a concat for Subnet 4's name.
Name of the first NIC to be allocated to the VM.
The suffix to append when doing a concat for the first NIC's name.

variables.diskStorageAccountResourceId: [resourceId(concat(parameters('orgCode'), '-', parameters('location1Code'), '-', parameters('serviceCode'), '-', parameters('stage1Code'), '-', parameters('diskStorageAccountResourceGroupSuffix')), 'Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts', concat(parameters('orgCode'), parameters('location1Code'), parameters('serviceCode'), parameters('stage1Code'), parameters('diskStorageAccountSuffix')))
variables.diagStorageAccountResourceId: [resourceId(concat(parameters('orgCode'), '-', parameters('location1Code'), '-', parameters('serviceCode'), '-', parameters('stage1Code'), '-', parameters('diagStorageAccountResourceGroupSuffix')), 'Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts', concat(parameters('orgCode'), parameters('location1Code'), parameters('serviceCode'), parameters('stage1Code'), parameters('diagStorageAccountSuffix')))
variables.subnet3ResourceId: [resourceId(concat(parameters('orgCode'), '-', parameters('location1Code'), '-', parameters('serviceCode'), '-', parameters('stage1Code'), '-', parameters('commonResourcesResourceGroupSuffix')), 'Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/subnets', concat(parameters('orgCode'), '-', parameters('location1Code'), '-', parameters('serviceCode'), '-', parameters('stage1Code'), '-', parameters('vnetSuffix'), '-', parameters('subnet3Suffix')))]
variables.subnet4ResourceId: [resourceId(concat(parameters('orgCode'), '-', parameters('location1Code'), '-', parameters('serviceCode'), '-', parameters('stage1Code'), '-', parameters('commonResourcesResourceGroupSuffix')), 'Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/subnets', concat(parameters('orgCode'), '-', parameters('location1Code'), '-', parameters('serviceCode'), '-', parameters('stage1Code'), '-', parameters('vnetSuffix'), '-', parameters('subnet4Suffix')))]

resources.name: [concat(parameters('orgCode'), '-', parameters('location1Code'), '-', parameters('serviceCode'), '-', parameters('stage1Code'), '-', parameters('vmSuffix'))]
dependsOn: [concat('Microsoft.Network/networkInterfaces/', parameters('orgCode'), '-', parameters('location1Code'), '-', parameters('serviceCode'), '-', parameters('stage1Code'), '-', parameters('vmSuffix'), '-', parameters('nic1Suffix'))]

vhd.uri: [concat('https://', concat(parameters('orgCode'), parameters('location1Code'), parameters('serviceCode'), parameters('stage1Code'), parameters('diskStorageAccountSuffix')), '.blob.core.windows.net/vhds/', variables('osDiskName'), '.vhd')]
